#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned ll
#define N 50009
int p[N];
bool visit[N];
vector<int>g[N];

void dfs(int u , int pp = -1){
    p[u] = pp;
    int sz = g[u].size();
    for(int i = 0 ; i < sz ; i++){
        int v = g[u][i];
        if(v != pp){
            dfs(v,u);
        }
    }
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
            visit[i]=false;
            p[i]=-1;
            g[i].clear();
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            int a,b;
            scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
            a--;b--;
            g[b].push_back(a);
            g[a].push_back(b);
        }
        dfs(0,-1);
        int cnt=0;
        int m;
        scanf("%d",&m);
        while(m--)
        {
            int node;
            scanf("%d",&node);
            node--;
            while(node!=-1 && visit[node]!=true )
            {
                visit[node] = true;
                cnt++;
                node = p[node];
            }
            printf("%d\n",n-cnt);
        }

    }

    return 0;
}
